00013 FirstCompleteAPGenerator::FirstCompleteAPGenerator(TAPGeneratorOptions* opts):
00014         TVAnalysedPulseGenerator("FirstComplete",opts){
00015         // Do things to set up the generator here.

00017 
00018 int FirstCompleteAPGenerator::ProcessPulses( 
00019                 const PulseIslandList& pulseList,
00020                 AnalysedPulseList& analysedList){
00021     // Do something here that takes the TPIs in the PulseIslandList and
00022     // fills the list of TAPS
00023 
00024   // The variables that this generator will be filling
00025   double amplitude, time, integral;
00026 
00027   // Get the relevant TSetupData/SetupNavigator variables for the algorithms
00028   std::string bankname = pulseList[0]->GetBankName();
00029 
00030   fMaxBinAmplitude.pedestal = fConstantFractionTime.pedestal = fSimpleIntegral.pedestal = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(bankname);
00031   fMaxBinAmplitude.trigger_polarity = fConstantFractionTime.trigger_polarity = fSimpleIntegral.trigger_polarity = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname);
00032   fConstantFractionTime.max_adc_value = std::pow(2, TSetupData::Instance()->GetNBits(bankname)) - 1;
00033   fConstantFractionTime.clock_tick_in_ns = TSetupData::Instance()->GetClockTick(bankname);
00034   fConstantFractionTime.time_shift = TSetupData::Instance()->GetTimeShift(bankname);
00035 
00036   TAnalysedPulse* tap;
00037   // Loop over all the TPIs given to us
00038   for (PulseIslandList::const_iterator tpi=pulseList.begin();
00039        tpi!=pulseList.end(); tpi++){
00040 
00041     // Analyse each TPI
00042     amplitude=fMaxBinAmplitude(*tpi);
00043     time=fConstantFractionTime(*tpi);
00044     integral=fSimpleIntegral(*tpi);
00045 
00046     // Now that we've found the information we were looking for make a TAP to
00047     // hold it.  This method makes a TAP and sets the parent TPI info.  It needs
00048     // the index of the parent TPI in the container as an argument
00049     tap = MakeNewTAP(tpi-pulseList.begin());
00050     tap->SetAmplitude(amplitude);
00051     tap->SetTime(time);
00052     tap->SetIntegral(integral);
00053 
00054     // Finally add the new TAP to the output list
00055     analysedList.push_back(tap);
00056    }
00057         
00058         // Generators have a Debug method similar to modules
00059         if(Debug()){
00060     // They also have a unique ID, retrievable by GetSource and
00061                 // a GetChannel method to get the ID of just the channel
00062     cout<<"Now running source: "<<GetSource().str()<<" which looks for TAPs on "
00063         "channel: "<<GetChannel().str()<<'\n';
00064         }
00065 
00066         // returning 0 tells the caller that we were successful, return non-zero if not
00067         return 0;
00068 }
00069 
00070 // Similar to the modules, this macro registers the generator with
00071 // MakeAnalysedPulses. The first argument is compulsory and gives the name of
00072 // this generator. All subsequent arguments will be used as names for arguments
00073 // given directly within the modules file.  See the github wiki for more.
00074 //
00075 // NOTE: for TAP generators OMIT the APGenerator part of the class' name
00076 ALCAP_TAP_GENERATOR(FirstComplete);
